channel.title: CVE Feed for Mahoroba Kobo, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mahoroba Kobo, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22279|2024-08-02T10:07:05.674Z -- mahoroba%20kobo%2C%20inc. -- maho-pbx%20netdevancer%20series
item.description: MAHO-PBX NetDevancer Lite/Uni/Pro/Cloud prior to Ver.1.11.00, MAHO-PBX NetDevancer VSG Lite/Uni prior to Ver.1.11.00, and MAHO-PBX NetDevancer MobileGate Home/Office prior to Ver.1.11.00 allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command.

item.title: CVE-2023-22286|2024-08-02T10:07:06.212Z -- mahoroba%20kobo%2C%20inc. -- maho-pbx%20netdevancer%20series
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MAHO-PBX NetDevancer Lite/Uni/Pro/Cloud prior to Ver.1.11.00, MAHO-PBX NetDevancer VSG Lite/Uni prior to Ver.1.11.00, and MAHO-PBX NetDevancer MobileGate Home/Office prior to Ver.1.11.00 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the user authentication and conduct user's unintended operations by having a user to view a malicious page while logged in.

item.title: CVE-2023-22296|2024-08-02T10:07:05.794Z -- mahoroba%20kobo%2C%20inc. -- maho-pbx%20netdevancer%20series
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in MAHO-PBX NetDevancer series MAHO-PBX NetDevancer Lite/Uni/Pro/Cloud prior to Ver.1.11.00, MAHO-PBX NetDevancer VSG Lite/Uni prior to Ver.1.11.00, and MAHO-PBX NetDevancer MobileGate Home/Office prior to Ver.1.11.00 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-22280|2024-08-02T10:07:05.651Z -- mahoroba%20kobo%2C%20inc. -- maho-pbx%20netdevancer%20series
item.description: MAHO-PBX NetDevancer Lite/Uni/Pro/Cloud prior to Ver.1.11.00, MAHO-PBX NetDevancer VSG Lite/Uni prior to Ver.1.11.00, and MAHO-PBX NetDevancer MobileGate Home/Office prior to Ver.1.11.00 allow a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to execute an arbitrary OS command.
